radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver parenchyma is heterogeneous and echogenic. The liver contour is smooth. No intrahepatic biliary dilation; the CBD measures 3 mm. No evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears normal without masses or ductal dilation. The spleen is normal with echogenicity, measuring 9.9 cm. The right kidney measures 11.6 cm with a simple cyst in the right upper pole measuring 2.6 x 2.7 x 2.4 cm. No ascites.
